DEVOPS Services

Unlock the power of DevOps to Streamline, Automate and Succeed

DevOps SERVICES

Unlock the power of DevOps to Streamline, Automate and Succeed

OFFERINGS

INSIGHTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CONTACT US

NeST Digital provides turn-key innovative and customized data solutions leveraging our internal specialized data team and partners. We offer flexible engagement and commercial models to meet the needs of their clients.

Offerings

DevOps Assessment & Planning

Our DevOps assessment service evaluates your capabilities and suggests improvements using industry-standard models like the DORA model. We create a customized roadmap and transformation strategy, helping you adopt DevOps practices, develop a cloud migration plan, enhance cybersecurity, and optimize cloud operations.

DevOps Implementation

Our engineers will implement the necessary infrastructure and pipelines for DevOps EPICs/stories in your environment. Our expertise includes Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment/Delivery, Continuous Monitoring, Continuous Security (DevSecOps), and Continuous Testing.

Cloud Migration and Infrastructure Management Service

We provide cloud migration and management services, enabling businesses to benefit from cloud computing’s scalability, flexibility, and cost savings. Our solutions involve designing and implementing cloud landing zones, utilizing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) patterns for infrastructure provisioning, and continuous application deployment across various environments.

Infrastructure Automation

We provide infrastructure automation services to help businesses automate the provisioning, configuration, and management of their IT infrastructure. Our solutions leverage tools such as Ansible and Terraform to ensure that infrastructure is consistent and reliable across development, testing, and production environments.

Cloud Infrastructure Security Service

We identify and implement security services to safeguard your cloud environment, encompassing firewalls, on-premise connectivity, and microservice connectivity. We address common issues, improve time-to-market, security, and cloud efficiency, helping businesses achieve DevOps and cloud computing objectives efficiently.

Highlights

Our DevOps and Cloud services offer several competitive advantages that set us apart from our competitors:

Deep Technical Expertise

Deep Technical Expertise: We provide our customers with comprehensive solutions that are tailored to their specific needs. Our team of experienced DevOps and cloud engineers have extensive technical expertise in the latest technologies and best practices, including Infrastructure as Code (IaC), serverless computing, and containerization.

End-to-End Services

We provide end-to-end services that cover the entire DevOps and cloud infrastructure lifecycle, from assessment and planning to implementation and ongoing management. This comprehensive approach ensures that our customers receive a seamless and integrated experience, with all aspects of their DevOps and cloud infrastructure managed by a single trusted partner.

Proven Methodologies & Framework

We use industry-standard methodologies and frameworks such as DORA (DevOps Research and Assessment) to assess and improve DevOps capabilities, ensuring that our solutions are based on proven best practices and are customized to each customer’s unique needs.

Strong Partnership

We prioritize building strong partnerships with our customers, working closely with them to understand their business goals and objectives, and developing solutions that help them achieve these goals. This allows us to deliver high-quality DevOps and cloud infrastructure solutions that enable customers to achieve their business objectives with speed, agility, and security.

Flexibility and Customization

Our services are highly flexible and customizable, enabling us to tailor solutions to meet the specific needs of the customer and deliver maximum value.

Speak to our DevOps experts today!

CONTACT US
